Uses of Package
org.gridgain.client

Packages that use org.gridgain.client
org.gridgain.client Public API for GridGain Java client. 
org.gridgain.client.balancer Provides API and implementations of simple load balancers. 
 

Classes in org.gridgain.client used by org.gridgain.client

          Java client API.
GridClientCacheFlag
          Cache projection flags that specify projection behaviour.
GridClientCacheMode
          Cache type on remote node.
GridClientClosedException
          This exception is thrown whenever a closed client is attempted to be used.

          A compute projection of grid client.
GridClientConfiguration
          Java client configuration.
GridClientData
          A data projection of grid client.
GridClientDataAffinity
          Interface that will determine which node should be connected by the client when operation on a key is requested.
GridClientDataConfiguration
          Java client data projection configuration.
GridClientDataMetrics
          Cache metrics used to obtain statistics on cache itself or any of its entries.
GridClientException
          Client exception.
GridClientFuture
          Future for asynchronous operations.
GridClientNode
          Node descriptor.
GridClientNodeMetrics
          Node metrics.
GridClientPredicate
          Defines predicate construct.
GridClientProtocol
          Protocol that will be used when client connections are created.
GridClientTopologyListener
          Listener interface for notifying on nodes joining or leaving remote grid.
GridServerUnreachableException
          This exception is thrown when none of the servers specified in client configuration can be connected to within timeout.
